name: Ender's Life
description:
Ender’s Life is a 2D Platformer Game developed not
only to provide entertainment but also to improve
the players’ cognitive skills. Ender’s Life
incorporates several elements such as enemies
and obstacles in order to improve the player’s
cognitive and motor skills. Contrary to most
modern games, Ender’s Life places more focus on
the gameplay as compared to the graphics. This
allows for the simpler elements within the game
such as the functions, platforms and movements to
be of more focus.
